Question
========

In a study examining the relationship between attending a statistics college (*x*) and developing psychosis (*y*), a correlation of r = 0.50 was found. This can be interpreted as

Answerlist
----------

* A 50% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.
* That for 50% of all y, prediction ($\hat{y}$) = y.
* A 25% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A 50% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.: Incorrect
* That for 50% of all y, prediction ($\hat{y}$) = y.: Incorrect
* A 25% decrease in errors of predicting y with x.: Correct
